Eligibility: Patients should have undergone breast conservation surgery for breast cancer or DCIS (ductal carcinoma in Situ)
No indication for regional node radiation therapy
Large pendulum breasts (arms size D and more)
Unable to stand in the position of preponderance
Results: · Quantitative comparison of the 3D dose distribution in the PTV (planning target volume) and in normal tissues in the preferred position relative to the supine position
Description of the arm/group: Pronate position
Unit of measure: Gy Dmin (Gy) PTV: 9.8 (6.7)
Description of the arm/group: Position of the epidermis
Unit of measurement: Gy Dmin (Gy) PTV: 8.2 (5.6)
